body_html: @jvdillon, it's like @alextp said: we don't want to have to change every single call in the library to have this check. In particular, we are using edward probablistic programming language. We considered to add a global check to edward, but the developers there suggested that more libraries will benefit from this fix if it's done in tensorflow directly.
body_text: @jvdillon, it's like @alextp said: we don't want to have to change every single call in the library to have this check. In particular, we are using edward probablistic programming language. We considered to add a global check to edward, but the developers there suggested that more libraries will benefit from this fix if it's done in tensorflow directly.
body: @jvdillon, it's like @alextp said: we don't want to have to change every single call in the library to have this check. In particular, we are using [edward probablistic programming language](http://edwardlib.org/). We considered to add a global check to edward, but the developers there [suggested](https://github.com/blei-lab/edward/issues/846) that more libraries will benefit from this fix if it's done in tensorflow directly.
